Module se1.bestellsystem

Package system

package system
Package exports system definitions for the ”se1.bestellsystem” order processing application.
Since:
1.0
Version:
"0.1.0"
Author:
AJ
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Calculator
    Public interface of calculator that contains method to calculate total prices and VAT on Orders
    DataRepository
    Public interface of data repositories that store objects (entities) of data model classes.
    DataRepository.ArticleRepository
    Public interface of the Article repository.
    DataRepository.CustomerRepository
    Public interface of the Customer repository.
    DataRepository.OrderRepository
    Public interface of the Order repository.
    Formatter
    Public interface of a Formatter component that provides methods and interfaces to format objects to text in an internal StringBuffer.
    Formatter.OrderTableFormatter
    Interface of a formatter for Order table output.
    Formatter.TableFormatter
    Interface of a formatter instance for table output.
    Printer
     
    RTE
    The Run-Time Environment (RTE) allows to configure and launch Runtime instances that offer public interfaces for all system components through their public interfaces.
    RTE.Configuration
    Interface to configure a Runtime instance before launch.
    RTE.Runtime
    A Runtime instance represents a running instance of the system.
